title: Toggle Non-Lethal Attacks
content:
Toggle Non-Lethal Attacks Actions Knock someone Unconscious instead of killing them. Must be unarmed or using a melee weapon. Doesn't work on undead and constructs. Melee Action

Toggle Non-Lethal Attacks

Knock someone Unconscious instead of killing them. Must be unarmed or using a melee weapon. Doesn't work on undead and constructs.

Toggle Non-Lethal Attacks is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid
